If You Do a Good Job ... You Can Get Rewards ! ;)

the fry:

Hey mod andy im a little confused how to play the moparscape server would it be easier just to make a server? How do i make a server? please help me lol : /

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:11, topic:130345”]Name on Forum : P I M P
Positon Wanted : Coder
Experience: 10/10
Online Time , Mostly : 11:30 AM- 12:00 AM[/quote]
